name: DATA_STRUCTURE
title: DATA_STRUCTURE
description: Abstract parent class of all data structure types. Includes the as_hierarchy function which can generate the equivalent CEN EN13606 single hierarchy for each subtype’s physical representation. For example, the physical representation of an ITEM_LIST is List<ELEMENT>; its implementation of as_hierarchy will generate a CLUSTER containing the set of ELEMENT nodes from the list.

element.short: Abstract parent class of all data structure types
